title:
A remark on the linearization of nondegenerate Nambu structures of
  coorder 1
abstract:
In this note we show that Nambu structures of coorder 1 can always be
linearized if they admit a closed integrable differential form. In particular,
we show that a unimodular Poisson structure whose isotropy Lie algebra at a
singular point is $\mathfrak{sl}(2,\mathbb{R})$, can always be linearized.
